meanings.definition: In a way that cannot be overcome or dealt with
meanings.sent1: The mountain was insurmountably tall for the hiker.
meanings.sent2: She found the task insurmountably difficult.
meanings.sent3: The challenge was insurmountably tough, but she tackled it with determination.
meanings.sent4: The wall of obstacles seemed insurmountably high, but she broke through with perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The problem appeared insurmountably complex, but she found a simple solution.

meanings.definition: To an extent that cannot be surpassed or exceeded
meanings.sent1: His dedication to his work insurmountably impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset insurmountably captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The speed of the cheetah insurmountably outpaced all other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness insurmountably touched the hearts of everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The flavor of the dish insurmountably delighted the taste buds of the guests.
